segment.source: Devices Prevent users from installing printer drivers (Windows 10)
segment.target: Devices Prevent users from installing printer drivers (Windows 10)

segment.source: Describes the best practices, location, values, and security considerations for the Devices Prevent users from installing printer drivers security policy setting.
segment.target: Describes the best practices, location, values, and security considerations for the Devices Prevent users from installing printer drivers security policy setting.

segment.source: Devices: Prevent users from installing printer drivers
segment.target: Devices: Prevent users from installing printer drivers

segment.source: Applies to
segment.target: Applies to

segment.source: Windows 10
segment.target: Windows 10

segment.source: Describes the best practices, location, values, and security considerations for the Devices: Prevent users from installing printer drivers security policy setting.
segment.target: Describes the best practices, location, values, and security considerations for the Devices: Prevent users from installing printer drivers security policy setting.

segment.source: Reference
segment.target: Reference

segment.source: For a device to print to a network printer, the driver for that network printer must be installed locally.
segment.target: For a device to print to a network printer, the driver for that network printer must be installed locally.

segment.source: The Devices: Prevent users from installing printer drivers policy setting determines who can install a printer driver as part of adding a network printer.
segment.target: The Devices: Prevent users from installing printer drivers policy setting determines who can install a printer driver as part of adding a network printer.

segment.source: When you set the value to Enabled, only Administrators and Power Users can install a printer driver as part of adding a network printer.
segment.target: When you set the value to Enabled, only Administrators and Power Users can install a printer driver as part of adding a network printer.

segment.source: Setting the value to Disabled allows any user to install a printer driver as part of adding a network printer.
segment.target: Setting the value to Disabled allows any user to install a printer driver as part of adding a network printer.

segment.source: This setting prevents unprivileged users from downloading and installing an untrusted printer driver.
segment.target: This setting prevents unprivileged users from downloading and installing an untrusted printer driver.

segment.source: This setting has no impact if you have configured a trusted path for downloading drivers.
segment.target: This setting has no impact if you have configured a trusted path for downloading drivers.

segment.source: When using trusted paths, the print subsystem attempts to use the trusted path to download the driver.
segment.target: When using trusted paths, the print subsystem attempts to use the trusted path to download the driver.

segment.source: If the trusted path download succeeds, the driver is installed on behalf of any user.
segment.target: If the trusted path download succeeds, the driver is installed on behalf of any user.

segment.source: If the trusted path download fails, the driver is not installed and the network printer is not added.
segment.target: If the trusted path download fails, the driver is not installed and the network printer is not added.

segment.source: Although it might be appropriate in some organizations to allow users to install printer drivers on their own workstations, this is not suitable for servers.
segment.target: Although it might be appropriate in some organizations to allow users to install printer drivers on their own workstations, this is not suitable for servers.

segment.source: Installing a printer driver on a server can cause the system to become less stable.
segment.target: Installing a printer driver on a server can cause the system to become less stable.

segment.source: Only administrators should have this user right on servers.
segment.target: Only administrators should have this user right on servers.

segment.source: A malicious user might deliberately try to damage the system by installing inappropriate printer drivers.
segment.target: A malicious user might deliberately try to damage the system by installing inappropriate printer drivers.

segment.source: Possible values
segment.target: Possible values

segment.source: Enabled
segment.target: Enabled

segment.source: Disabled
segment.target: Disabled

segment.source: Not defined
segment.target: Not defined

segment.source: Best practices
segment.target: Best practices

segment.source: It is advisable to set Devices: Prevent users from installing printer drivers to Enabled.
segment.target: It is advisable to set Devices: Prevent users from installing printer drivers to Enabled.

segment.source: Only users in the Administrative, Power User, or Server Operator groups will be able to install printers on servers.
segment.target: Only users in the Administrative, Power User, or Server Operator groups will be able to install printers on servers.

segment.source: If this policy setting is enabled, but the driver for a network printer already exists on the local computer, users can still add the network printer.
segment.target: If this policy setting is enabled, but the driver for a network printer already exists on the local computer, users can still add the network printer.

segment.source: This policy setting does not affect a user's ability to add a local printer.
segment.target: This policy setting does not affect a user's ability to add a local printer.

segment.target: Location

segment.target: Computer ConfigurationWindows SettingsSecurity SettingsLocal PoliciesSecurity Options

segment.source: Policy management
segment.target: Policy management

segment.source: This section describes features and tools that are available to help you manage this policy.
segment.target: This section describes features and tools that are available to help you manage this policy.

segment.source: Restart requirement
segment.target: Restart requirement

segment.source: None.
segment.target: None.

segment.source: Changes to this policy become effective without a computer restart when they are saved locally or distributed through Group Policy.
segment.target: Changes to this policy become effective without a computer restart when they are saved locally or distributed through Group Policy.

segment.source: Security considerations
segment.target: Security considerations

segment.source: This section describes how an attacker might exploit a feature or its configuration, how to implement the countermeasure, and the possible negative consequences of countermeasure implementation.
segment.target: This section describes how an attacker might exploit a feature or its configuration, how to implement the countermeasure, and the possible negative consequences of countermeasure implementation.

segment.source: Vulnerability
segment.target: Vulnerability

segment.source: It may be appropriate in some organizations to allow users to install printer drivers on their own workstations.
segment.target: It may be appropriate in some organizations to allow users to install printer drivers on their own workstations.

segment.source: However, you should allow only administrators, not users, to do so on servers because printer driver installation on a server may unintentionally cause the computer to become less stable.
segment.target: However, you should allow only administrators, not users, to do so on servers because printer driver installation on a server may unintentionally cause the computer to become less stable.

segment.source: A malicious user could install inappropriate printer drivers in a deliberate attempt to damage the computer, or a user might accidentally install malicious software that masquerades as a printer driver.
segment.target: A malicious user could install inappropriate printer drivers in a deliberate attempt to damage the computer, or a user might accidentally install malicious software that masquerades as a printer driver.

segment.source: Countermeasure
segment.target: Countermeasure

segment.source: Enable the Devices: Prevent users from installing printer drivers setting.
segment.target: Enable the Devices: Prevent users from installing printer drivers setting.

segment.source: Potential impact
segment.target: Potential impact

segment.source: Only members of the Administrator, Power Users, or Server Operator groups can install printers on the servers.
segment.target: Only members of the Administrator, Power Users, or Server Operator groups can install printers on the servers.

segment.source: If this policy setting is enabled but the driver for a network printer already exists on the local computer, users can still add the network printer.
segment.target: If this policy setting is enabled but the driver for a network printer already exists on the local computer, users can still add the network printer.
